Lunda, nke a makwaara dịka Chilunda, bụ asụsụ Bantu a na-asụ na Zambia, Angola na, ruo n'ókè dị ala, na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Lunda na olumba ya na-asụ ma ghọta ma eleghị anya 4.6% nke ndị Zambia (atụle 1986), a na-ejikwa asụsụ ahụ mee ihe karịsịa na mpaghara Northwestern nke Zambia
Enwere ike ịchọta ọtụtụ n'ime ndị Lunda na DRC, ọkachasị Katanga Province, ya na na Angola
A na-anọchite anya ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke asụsụ Lunda na Namibia.
/w/ enwekwara ike ịnụ dị ka bilabial glide [βʹ].
